- <v_quote>39.9 x 38.3 x 38.4 inches box</v_quote>
- <v_quote>Rule1: If the mouse has a basketball that fits in a 39.9 x 38.3 x 38.4 inches box, then the mouse does not negotiate a deal with the poodle</v_quote>
- <v_quote>Rule2: if the mouse negotiates a deal with the poodle, then the poodle will, without hesitation, hug the reindeer</v_quote>

Step 2: Logical reasoning
- A 29-inch diameter basketball clearly fits within a 39.9 x 38.3 x 38.4 inches box
- This means the mouse can negotiate with the poodle
- Rule2 then states the poodle will hug the reindeer if negotiation occurs

The logical chain is clear and unambiguous. Debater B's reasoning is more sound and supported by the verified quotes.
